an3.103:4.1: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
an3.103:4.2: ‘ko nu kho loke assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan’ti?
an3.103:4.4: ‘yaṃ kho lokaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ loke assādo.
an3.103:4.5: Yaṃ loko anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo, ayaṃ loke ādīnavo.
an3.103:4.6: Yo loke chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ loke nissaraṇan’ti.
an3.103:4.7: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, evaṃ lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
an3.103:4.8: Yato ca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, evaṃ lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
an3.103:4.10: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
